isis.stitle: TRW MANUAL STEERING GEAR - GENERAL INFORMATION - HOUSING GEAR STOPS

svcproc.title: HOUSING GEAR STOPS
svcproc.para: The Worm and Roller Steering Gears are designed with integral stops in the housing to limit the travel of the output shaft and thereby prevent mesh runout of the roller tooth with the worm. These stops are not intended to absorb road shock or act as wheel stops. It is therefore necessary that vehicle axle stops be used and designed with a safety factor of several degrees at each end of gear travel to prevent contact with these internal gear stops.
